June 13, 1971 D Buxton Festival (Junior Class)
Buxton Festival (Junior Class) 104 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-junior-class
Pavilion Gardens, Buxton Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £5, 3rd £5. Best trombone - Glossop School. 3 bands competed.
June 18, 2016, 3:33 p.m. June 18, 2016, 3:38 p.m.

2 Brodsworth Colliery Junior Robert Oughton A Rural Suite
3 Stannington Community Association R. Shaw
